mapper.insert: insert into tbl_user(user_id, user_pw, user_phone, user_name, user_email, admin) values(#{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_phone}, #{user_name}, #{user_email}, #{admin})
mapper.select: select admin from tbl_user where user_id = #{user_id}
select count(*) from tbl_review where review_id = #{user_id}
select user_stopdate from tbl_user where user_id = #{user_id}

select dc.demerit_content,d.demerit_value,d.demerit_date,d.user_id from tbl_demerit d join tbl_demerit_code dc on d.demerit_code = dc.demerit_code where user_id = #{user_id} order by d.demerit_num desc
select * from tbl_user where user_id = #{user_id} and user_email = #{user_email}
select count(*) from tbl_Reservation where user_id = #{user_id}
